attributes.action: Pay £1,000,000 to each GB passport holder to accept no-deal
attributes.background: Would give the public the financial security that they desire to get through our exit from the EU and stimulate the economy and lift the nation's mood. Currently, the Nations mood is depressed and we are divided and fractious. We need a dramatic idea to pull the public together.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's not the UK Government or Parliament's responsibility to pay people to support a particular policy. In some circumstances this may even be illegal.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/254913
